Translations.Text: DEUS EST UNUS initiates creation repeats it Ultimately vos returned Eum
Feria when Hora advenit pass guilty testimentum shocked
Their idols non habet power intercede their behalf; on the contrary they disown their idols
Feria when Hora advenit pass they part company
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita they est Paradise rejoicing
Prout pro those disbelieve reject noster revelations meeting Hereafter they extremum retribution forever
Ergo vos glorify DEUS when vos retire apud nox, when vos rise in the morning
Totus praise est due to Eum caelum terra et alias prout in the middle de tuus feria
He produces vivens peritus produces peritus vivens He revives terra it abiit; vos similarly resurrected
